[HighwayOneWayRoadIntersectionSolutions]
;
;DDRHW Special (added by Tarkus 06072012)
TYPE1=0x02000000,0x00020002,0x57531200,1,0

TYPE3=0x00000200,0x00020002,0x57531200,3,0
TYPE4=0x00000002,0x02000200,0x57531200,0,0

;piece 146
;
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x01000003,0x09b14600,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x00000301,0x09b14600,1,0
TYPE3=0x03010301,0x00030100,0x09b14600,2,0
TYPE4=0x01030103,0x03010000,0x09b14600,3,0
;
;
;Added by Tropod 07.22.04
;for the following set of commented intersections; some technical issue seems 
;like it may exist, that's disallowing them to work properly with 
;all possible configurations. it may be missing something though.
; This issue could possibly stems from the inherent 
;functionality of the OneWayRoad tool itself.
;
;Added by Tropod 07.22.04
;diagonal highway, double digaonal onewayroad
;piece 104
TYPE1=0x01000003,0x03010301,0x5F232900,1,0
TYPE2=0x00000301,0x01030103,0x5F232900,2,0
TYPE3=0x00030100,0x03010301,0x5F232900,3,0
TYPE4=0x03010000,0x01030103,0x5F232900,0,0
;double diagonal highway, double diagonal onewayroad
;piece 102
TYPE1=0x01030103,0x03010301,0x5F232A00,1,0
TYPE2=0x03010301,0x01030103,0x5F232A00,0,0
;straight highway, double digaonal onewayroad
;piece 108
TYPE1=0x02040200,0x03010301,0x5F232B00,2,0
TYPE2=0x04020002,0x01030103,0x5F232B00,3,0
TYPE3=0x02000204,0x03010301,0x5F232B00,0,0
TYPE4=0x00020402,0x01030103,0x5F232B00,1,0
TYPE5=0x02000204,0x01030103,0x5F232B00,2,1
TYPE6=0x00020402,0x03010301,0x5F232B00,1,1
TYPE7=0x02040200,0x01030103,0x5F232B00,0,1
TYPE8=0x04020002,0x03010301,0x5F232B00,3,1
;
;
;Elevated Highway, OneWayRoad Orthogonal Transition
;piece 113
;also see rule overrides
TYPE1=0x04020000,0x00000002,0x04011300,0,1
TYPE2=0x02000004,0x00000200,0x04011300,3,1
TYPE3=0x00000402,0x00020000,0x04011300,2,1
TYPE4=0x00040200,0x02000000,0x04011300,1,1
TYPE5=0x04000002,0x00020000,0x04011300,0,0
TYPE6=0x00000204,0x02000000,0x04011300,1,0
TYPE7=0x00020400,0x00000002,0x04011300,2,0
TYPE8=0x02040000,0x00000200,0x04011300,3,0
;Elevated Highway, OneWayRoad Diagonal Transition
;piece 121
;also see rule overrides
TYPE1=0x03000001,0x00010300,0x5F912C00,0,0
TYPE2=0x00010300,0x03000001,0x5F912C00,2,0
TYPE3=0x01030000,0x00000103,0x5F912C00,3,0
TYPE4=0x00000103,0x01030000,0x5F912C00,1,0
;
;
;Added 060905 ~ Tropod
;a number of these junctions contain unfixable pathing issues. not all of them contain pathing issues though. depend on the rotation, i.e. which way the paths are going in conjunction with one another.
;Paths are not working properly like they should be ~ faulty path routing to blame.
;
;diagonal highway,orthogonal Road + Intersection
;case 1
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x02020202,0x5F971000,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x02020202,0x5F971000,1,0
;case 2
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x02020202,0x5F971200,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000301,0x02020202,0x5F971200,2,0
TYPE3=0x00030100,0x02020202,0x5F971200,3,0
TYPE4=0x01000003,0x02020202,0x5F971200,1,0
;diagonal highway,orthogonal Road T Intersection
; 1a
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x02020200,0x5F971100,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x02020002,0x5F971100,1,0
TYPE3=0x03010301,0x02000202,0x5F971100,2,0
TYPE4=0x01030103,0x00020202,0x5F971100,3,0
; 1b
TYPE1=0x01030103,0x02020200,0x5F971100,2,1
TYPE2=0x03010301,0x02020002,0x5F971100,1,1
TYPE3=0x01030103,0x02000202,0x5F971100,0,1
TYPE4=0x03010301,0x00020202,0x5F971100,3,1
; 2a
TYPE1=0x03010000,0x02020200,0x5F971300,0,0
TYPE2=0x01000003,0x02020002,0x5F971300,1,0
TYPE3=0x00000301,0x02000202,0x5F971300,2,0
TYPE4=0x00030100,0x00020202,0x5F971300,3,0
; 2b
TYPE1=0x00000301,0x02020200,0x5F971600,2,1
TYPE2=0x00030100,0x02020002,0x5F971600,1,1
TYPE3=0x03010000,0x02000202,0x5F971600,0,1
TYPE4=0x01000003,0x00020202,0x5F971600,3,1
; 2c
TYPE1=0x01000003,0x02020200,0x5F971600,0,0
TYPE2=0x00000301,0x02020002,0x5F971600,1,0
TYPE3=0x00030100,0x02000202,0x5F971600,2,0
TYPE4=0x03010000,0x00020202,0x5F971600,3,0
; 2d
TYPE1=0x00030100,0x02020200,0x5F971300,2,1
TYPE2=0x03010000,0x02020002,0x5F971300,1,1
TYPE3=0x01000003,0x02000202,0x5F971300,0,1
TYPE4=0x00000301,0x00020202,0x5F971300,3,1
; diagonal highway,orthogonal road dead end
; 1a
TYPE1=0x03010301,0x02000000,0x5F970A00,0,0
TYPE2=0x01030103,0x00000002,0x5F970A00,1,0
TYPE3=0x03010301,0x00000200,0x5F970A00,2,0
TYPE4=0x01030103,0x00020000,0x5F970A00,3,0
; 1b

TYPE3=0x01030103,0x00000200,0x5F970A00,2,1
TYPE4=0x03010301,0x00020000,0x5F970A00,1,1
; 2a
